feed.title: Lychee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lychee: Version 6.1.1 - Quick fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Authentik icon by @sushain97 in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2738
  • Fix wrong config in album by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2741
  • Fix create Tag album callback not triggering by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2743
  • Version 6.1.1 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2742

New Contributors

  • @sushain97 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2738

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.1.0...v6.1.1

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Avoid preventing rendering when albums is returning 401 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2745
  • Fix photo timeline when there are no borders by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2746
  • Create automated Signed releases. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2749
  • ListAlbum fix by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2753
  • version 6.1.2 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2747

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.1.1...v6.1.2

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Change the plaintext-field to a password-field in AlbumUnlock by @Gendra13 in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2757
  • Documentation stuff by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2756
  • Fix error appearing when clicking on + menu in Smart albums by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2759
  • Add password unlocking middleware by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2761
  • Fix copy move selection by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2760
  • Add Album loading progress spinner by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2751
  • Close left menu when loading the gallery by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2785
  • Add configuration setting for number of albums per row in mobile view by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2784
  • Fix hidden gallery footer social icons by @pmrowla in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2788
  • Fixes Justify layout by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2766
  • :warning: Add page that allows to fix broken trees by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2768
  • Small fixes for mobile view by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2805
  • Code cleanup, resort imports by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2806
  • Activate Focus on Input elements by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2808
  • Fix disabling the copyright in footer not working as expected. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2810
  • Improve instruction for using tags by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2811
  • API documentation improved and auto generated. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2812
  • Version 6.2.0 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2813

New Contributors

  • @Gendra13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2757
  • @pmrowla made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2788

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.1.2...v6.2.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • Composer + npm update by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2824
  • Fix user count not updated on front-end when creating new users by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2823
  • Update README.md by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2825
  • Optimize User Management by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2827
  • Remove Keyboard Navigation help view on mobile by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2830
  • Fix dialog width for mobile by @tinohager in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2829
  • Fixes upload fails for non-existent partner video upload to S3 by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2849
  • Fix functionality to hide back button when configuration is set by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2852
  • Fix aesthetics of footer social icons by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2851
  • Add scroll to top when pressing the 'i' or clicking on details by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2850
  • Exit with error for unsupported S3 backend by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2856
  • Force redirection if accessing urls where being logged is required by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2846
  • Fix webauthn not showing up by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2858
  • Minor UI improvements by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2860
  • dependencies updates by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2845
  • Improve spinner on Mobile UI by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2847
  • Fix missing include in hook-redirection.blade.php by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2870
  • Resolve route name clashes to enable cache generation by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2869
  • Add additional CSP header configuration options by @kiancross in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2871
  • The eye does nothing if there are no hidden albums by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2857
  • Update french translation by @jphuguet in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2867
  • Fix download image on context menu by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2874
  • End of Line fixed during clone to avoid prettier to mess up formatting by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2875
  • Drop laminas-text, add related source files to Lychee by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2876
  • Fixes "Videos not loading when going consecutively" by @sancsin in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2879
  • Fix sonar warning by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2880
  • Npm/composer update by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2881
  • Dropping support of php8.2 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2884
  • Update artifact actions by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2885
  • Improve version wording by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2887
  • Reset localization (sorry) + improved clarity of language setup by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2877
  • UI fix maintenance button alignment by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2888
  • Use h-40 instead of h-56 for maintenance block. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2893
  • Fix diagnostics not being complete on version 6 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2892
  • Add Docker info, do not display Update Maintenance on docker by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2894
  • Fix docker status always returning custom. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2899
  • Fixes Session timeout error #2896 and #2897 by @sancsin in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2898
  • Group dependencies update from dependabots by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2914
  • Add license + copyright to all files by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2891
  • Update README.md by @Espionage724 in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2919
  • Implements enhancement ideas in #2924 and #2925 and fixes #2925 by @sancsin in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2927
  • Fix links from LycheeOrg.github.io to LycheeOrg.dev by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2929
  • Mark all legacy classes as final by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2928
  • Set up codeowners in simple way by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2930
  • Remove some exceptions from phpstan.neon by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2931
  • Improve code coverage by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2923
  • Zip are directly GET requests we do not have the XSRF token by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2936
  • Scroll to thumbnail of viewed photo in Album View by @sancsin in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2945
  • Add configuration integrity check by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2922
  • Check that the copyright notice is present in all files by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2921
  • Add latency middleware to see loading times in development by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2947
  • Fix forgotten to cast to boolean. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2948
  • Update csp config with base. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2952
  • Add a feature flag to disable the content-type verification by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2955
  • Add a small heartbeat endpoint by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2958
  • Minor UX UI improvements by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2959
  • Add license checker by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2960
  • Fix cors setting on Vite 6.0.9 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2962
  • Allow to edit taken_at date by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2954
  • Add class-leak checker. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2973
  • Add modal for creating sharing by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2938
  • Sharing propagation backend. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2950
  • Add sharing propagation front-end by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2951
  • Fixes the delete button text by @RustyPotato in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2977
  • Fixes Displayed Times in Jobs page by @RustyPotato in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2978
  • More missing dialog strings. by @RustyPotato in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2979
  • Add Caching for faster response time. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2859
  • Make sure that all v2 API routes are covered by the caching. by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2981
  • Fix landing page animations by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2982
  • Fix broken build on ARM by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2990
  • Fixes #2993 and #2992 by @sancsin in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2994
  • Frontend part of Duplicate Finder by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2890
  • Backend part of duplicate finder by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2889
  • Php 32bit - Zip-stream with version 2.1 instead of 3.1 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2934
  • Fix api doc not showing by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2996
  • Feature: Authelia login support by @usmanatron in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3001
  • Update dependencies + fix CVE complaint from OSSF by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3003
  • Improve .env.example by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3004
  • Version 6.3.0 by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2991

New Contributors

  • @jphuguet made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2867
  • @sancsin made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2879
  • @Espionage724 made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2919
  • @RustyPotato made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/2977
  • @usmanatron made their first contribution in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3001

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.2.0...v6.3.0

entry.title: New release for Lychee: v6.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

üèï Features

  • 6.3.1: catch Error when Redis is crashing and not die in 500... by @ildyria in https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/pull/3006

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LycheeOrg/Lychee/compare/v6.3.0...v6.3.1
